# Test Fixtures

This folder contains large text fixtures used by tests for trigram generation.
The committed fixture files in this folder have been stripped of Project Gutenberg
header/footer boilerplate so only the core book content is used in tests.

## Files

- `project_gutenberg_frankenstein.txt`
  - Title: _Frankenstein; or, The Modern Prometheus_
  - Author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley
  - Project Gutenberg eBook: `#84`
  - Source page: https://www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/84
  - UTF-8 text: https://www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/84.txt.utf-8

- `project_gutenberg_kalevala.txt`
  - Title: _Kalevala_
  - Compiler: Elias Lonnrot
  - Project Gutenberg eBook: `#7000`
  - Source page: https://www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/7000
  - UTF-8 text: https://www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/7000.txt.utf-8

- `pride_and_prejudice.txt`
  - Title: _Pride and Prejudice_
  - Author: Jane Austen
  - Project Gutenberg eBook: `#1342`
  - Source page: https://www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/1342
  - UTF-8 text: https://www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/1342.txt.utf-8
